storyInfo: Iana and a teacher-student pair of Durin inventors journey together to an underground city in search of answers.

attributes.content: A clack, then the final ball on the table rolls into its hole.
Nice shot.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: How did I only manage to sink my first shot? You somehow got every other ball.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Sorry about that.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: I warned you not to play billiards with him, Blitz.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Fuze has been hanging out in Siracusa for months.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: If his Matryoshka didn't accidentally blow up that Famiglia Operation, who knows how long he would have been undercover at that billiards hall?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: What've they got there?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Intel.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: That's all?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: ...And a party full of animal ears.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: The one you blew up?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That was an accident.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Believe me, I did not intend to get involved in famiglia feuding.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Tachanka's laughter echoes from the inner room.
Blitz shrugs, tossing the pocketed balls onto the table. Fuze picks up the triangle frame, gathering the scattered balls.
Following their own 'clacking,' they've found themselves scattered across this unfamiliar land called Terra, each pursuing answers to their own questions.
They've agreed to meet up regularly at this rest stop, to trade stories, compile information, and seek a way home to Earth.
By the way... where is Iana?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: She's missing yet another one of our meetings?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: No one knows where she's gone, just like last time.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: The point is, we shouldn't expect her today.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Blitz, without an ounce of surprise, shouts into the inner room—
You hear that, Tachanka? What did I just tell you?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: So she missed a meeting? What's the big deal?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: If she misses the 'spaceship' back to Earth, then we'll have a problem on our hands.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I wonder...?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: No, out of all of us, she has to be the one who'd most like to stay in this land of mystery.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I see light. We're not far now.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What's out there?
I don't know.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It's too tight, I can't move much.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Can you stretch a bit further? Right, through the gap, then slightly to the right.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Wait, we may have a small problem...
That's enough.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: But...
I see now, we've reached a good place.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It's the mouth of a cave.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Beyond it is a forest, with deciduous trees typical of temperate climates.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Clouds, fowlbeasts, a lazy river... Good weather, bright sun, no sign of danger.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Is this where we need to be?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: No, probably not...
Oh no...
What is it?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Ms. Meijer, can your Gemini reposition the mechanical arm for me?
If we can straighten it back out... The joint seems to be malfunctioning, and I can't retract it.
Sorry, it's just a projection.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'm afraid it can't help you.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: So...
We're in trouble!
I think we're stuck here!
——! What are you doing?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I have to pull the arm through the crack in the rock. We need it for the Triple Aquapit Handstand Twists...
Press this, then this, then pull this all the way down...
The engine is overheating, wait, stop, don't—
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Oh no, Ms. Meijer...
It can't be stopped!
Wh—
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The explosion and its shockwave echoes through the forest, startling several fowlbeasts.
Inventor, status report?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Keeping it together. Where I come from, an explosion of that scale is no big deal.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: But there are some issues with the mobility and power modules. I need to figure out how to get it moving again...
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: I've looked it over. Aside from the broken arm, there's basically no damage.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: It's not every day I see a surface-dweller like you eager to help me.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: By the way, your student there... She seems a little upset.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: She brought back a basket of fruit just now and then left without a word.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Hah, she's probably mad I messed things up.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: When I designed this drilling vehicle, I never imagined it would take such a long way to get to another city to win an inventor's award!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: I'd think it'd have some kind of navigation system...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Navigation? We have no need of such things.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: See where that river goes underground? We just follow that and we'll reach the Durin city we're looking for!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: The maps are in our heads, we just don't know what Durin from which city made this passage so twisty-turny...
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Couldn't we just walk right there?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Impossible!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: How am I supposed to attend the award ceremony without my invention?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Are you telling me this stranded drilling vehicle is your entry for the invention award?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: I thought it was that 'instant brewing machine.'
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: That's nothing special. The Durin cities are full of those things.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: But with the vehicle as it is, I can't imagine it'll make it past the first round.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: You think it's so ruined?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Don't worry, flaws can highlight the uniqueness of a new invention.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Hah hah! You must know, it's uniqueness that pulls in the votes.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: No, the real issue here is that it might not even make it to the event.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Miss, I think you're much more impatient than I.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: The Durin city is right over there, we'll make it sooner or later.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: There might be another way.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I can make it there, as long as I follow this river...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Yes, just follow the river, pass through four caves, then, when you see the eighth giant mushroom, you climb along the rock wall until...
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Well, long story short, you'll need a Durin guide or you'll definitely end up going a roundabout way!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: More importantly, if you don't bring an exciting new invention to the Durins, they probably won't let you in!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Have patience, let me fix it, and it will surely take you where you want to be!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Where I want to be...?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I hope so.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Alright, leave it to me.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Can you check on the girl? If you brought back some food, that would be even better.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Are we ready to go?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Not yet...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Your master says he wants to fix the drilling vehicle.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Hmph, what a pain! He's so unreliable!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: I already told him that scrap heap won't win him any awards.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: And he actually thinks he can do the Triple Aquapit Handstand Twists with it! Ridiculous! Just thinking about it makes me cringe.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: What are these, Ms. Meijer?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Surveying instruments, survival gear, a few solar panels.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I use them to help me while exploring.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Oh, it's the stuff you use to go playing outside.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: It's important to have fun stuff.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: There's lots of fun stuff at the City's Best Invention competition. I've been looking forward to it for ages!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: But... if I knew it would turn out like this, I wouldn't have gone with him.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Either way, we're here now, so all we can do is wait.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Let's go take a look around that forest.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The river flows gently. Iana lies on the rocks by the shore, staring intently at the water.
Suddenly, ripples appear on the surface. She immediately presses a button on her control panel—
A spring-loaded net on the riverbed shoots up, pouncing the finbeast into the bucket at Iana's feet, all in one smooth motion.
Wow! You caught it!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Inconceivable! How did you do that?!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: It's just a remote control, a set of signal transceivers, and a mesh net. It's all spare parts from the drilling vehicle...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I linked them together to do this.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I see, so this is your new invention!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: It's much more interesting than the drilling vehicle!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: An invention? I wouldn't call it that...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: She holds her breath and turns back to the river.
The swaying of the trees, the dissipation of the clouds, and the refracted sunlight create a mosaic on the water's surface.
Suddenly, Iana's pupils show with golden spots.
From another perspective, the shimmering waves no longer disturb her.
Just as a tiny disturbance affects the water's surface, the net springs up again.
A larger, more vivacious finbeast emerges from the river.
Woah! You got another one!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Alright, we're good.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We've got enough drinking water, some finbeasts, fruit, and with the leftover food from before, we should be alright for the next few days... Even if it's a few more after that, we should have plenty.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Can I try?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Take the control panel, hold onto this, and press this button...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: No, that's not what I mean.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: You keep it.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: We're going to play a game.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Play? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'll swim from there. When you see me, hit the button.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: The net will bounce me out of the water with a splash, just like the finbeasts.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: I... don't think the fishing... err, finning device can be used like that.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: But it's the most fun water toy I've ever seen!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Let's stay here and play some more!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Here?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Wait, you mean skip visiting the Durin city?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: But... don't you want to attend the ceremony?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Yes, because I want to visit their water park and try out all kinds of new water toys and games from the competition!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: But why bother with that when I'm having so much fun right here! I've got the funnest 'Spring-loaded Aquanet'!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Can we try your new invention again? I've come up with a few more games!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: How about 'Forest River Net Hide-And-Seek'? Come on, close your eyes and count to a hundred!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Here, fruity fin skewers!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Oh... is that 'Durin Engineering' you're reading?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: It's a fascinating journal.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It has a dozen pages of Durin research papers and hundreds of pages of Durin invention stories besides.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Say, kid, what does this say here?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Hm, it says 'Knock eight times at the bottom, then turn the input knob to...'
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: That's good. I can make sense of most of the rest, it's just this one part. Are you sure it means 'knock eight times'?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Yeah! Totally sure!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Why do you need to know?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: I'm just trying to learn the composition and function of these modules... might come in handy.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I see, you want to improve the Spring-loaded Aquanet or make some new water toy.
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: No, I just want to fix the drilling vehicle as soon as possible, so we can move on to that underground city.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: But why do you want to go to the city?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: ...I haven't yet determined the outcome.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I can only be certain once I have seen all the possibilities.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Will you play in the water with us then?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Me...? Probably not.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: But... if you're not going to enjoy the water, what's the point of going to the city?
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: The point?
Over the course of a journey, speculation is disproven time and again.
She gradually comes to realize a feeling like searching for an important item in an old room.
Scouring the bookshelf, going through drawers, until only a round steel box under the bed remains unopened...
She might have guessed the answer, but she still needs to find the box and open it.
No, there is a meaning to all this.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The next day...
What?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: You're telling me the drilling vehicle still isn't fixed?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: No... that's not the way I'd put it.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: It's more like... the drilling vehicle is unfixable... hic!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: You reek of booze!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: ...All the fruit I picked yesterday is in the instant brewing machine!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Sure is. Made some nice fruity wine... this forest is great, I'd like to stay here.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: I worked on the vehicle late into the night, but I couldn't fix the power modules. Lucky I've got this wine... hic.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: I oughta name it, something like 'Drilling Vehicle No. 2' Vintage, how's that sound?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Personally, I love it. A loving tribute to our fallen 'Drilling Vehicle No. 1'
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Master! Master!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Wine...
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Iana sighs as black smoke rises from the drilling vehicle.
What do we do? We'll never make it to the Durin city at this rate.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Sounds good to me!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: We can keep playing 'Forest River Net Hide-And-Seek'!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: No... we're done playing.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We're going to that city.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Ms. Meijer? But, Master...
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: How many days until the competition?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Three!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: That's a bit tight... we might not make it.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: If we can't make it, there's always next week! And the week after that!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: The City's Best Invention is a weekly competition!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Okay, then we'll shoot for the week after next.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Say, kid, you want to try an even more fun water toy?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I just got a great idea.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Hm? Where am I? I've been asleep for a while, huh...?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: I remember drinking some delicious fruit wine... Ah, yes, my drilling vehicle, I still have to fix my drilling vehicle!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: No, I think I'm actually inside it... and it's roomier now.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: And... it's moving?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Is this really happening...?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Ms. Meijer—
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Miss—
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: The Durin inventor opens the cabin door, only to be left speechless by the scene before him.
The 'City's Best Invention' nominee, the drilling vehicle he is so proud of, is currently navigating a subterranean river.
Master! You're awake!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Welcome to 'Drilling Vehicle No. 3'!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: We should probably call it the Drilling Boat now.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It seems my hangover hasn't worn off yet. How long was I out...? No, I don't feel drunk, but I am a bit dizzy...
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: So... what exactly is going on here?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Your student and I made a few small modifications.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It's all thanks to her that I could bring my idea to life.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The drill is now a rudder!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: We also installed an upgraded version of the Spring-loaded Aquanet!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: We had to discard some damaged parts, sorry about that. But it helped significantly reduce the weight of the Drilling Boat.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Discarded? You mean the Originium power modules...? But how is it moving without power?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: We're traveling with the flow of the water. The river provides some propulsion.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: And just in case that's not enough, we also have this.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The mechanical arm...? No, it's more like an oar now.
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Hah! Who would've thought we'd row our way to the award ceremony!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: This really is... unique!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: What do you think? Should we plow right up to the podium through the dome's waterway?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: That has the makings of a great story... I need to jot that down and submit it to 'Durin Engineering' later!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Do you feel like it's going faster and faster?
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Yes, it's definitely speeding up!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Oh, looks like we're about to head into a dark, underground river.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Dark? So...
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Open the sealed hatch, kid, we're going to dive!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Dive!
attributes.name: Elderly Durin

attributes.content: Dive!
attributes.name: Young Durin

attributes.content: Get ready, hold on tight—
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Ooooh!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: What other secrets do they have? I'll see with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Give me something to look forward to, surprise me again—
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Alright, any guesses on where Iana is exploring this time?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Siestan hot springs.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mt. Kjerag.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Maybe Rim Billiton, or Minos...?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: In any case... Iana is as curious about this land as any of us.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Her curiosity is just a bit more vigorous than ours.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I only wish she would use some of that energy to find a way back to Earth!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Listen, Blitz.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: If there's a way back to Earth, I guarantee I'll be the first to find it.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Iana?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You actually came!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Why did you bring so much stuff...?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What's this... an Instant Brewing Machine?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Hah! Looks like fun! Let me try!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: These files... geological and environmental survey samples from all across Terra.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Columbia, Sargon, Victoria... it's all very detailed.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Some locations are highlighted, they look similar to the cave at Magnethill No.2.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Do you think these places might lead back home?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Iana pulls out a sheet of paper from the bottom and places it atop the thick stack of data files.
It is her report on the Durin city.
The conclusion here... eliminated?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: You mean you've ruled out this location as a possible passageway back?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: All my hypothesised locations have failed to yield any results.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I investigated each one, personally, and the Durin city was my last stop.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I've concluded that none of them are linked to the cave at Magnethill No. 2.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: If we're going to find a way back to Earth, it'll be something else.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Kind of expected.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Hmph, then let's start searching another route. I'm even more motivated now!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We could start exploring Originium.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: The land is plagued by Oripathy, but maybe it is hiding the information we need.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Yes, it is possible.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Let's get exploring.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Nothing, just... I thought you would be the last person here looking for a way back to Earth.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Why would you think that?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I am not just going to sit down and accept this.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: If I've been brought here without any idea as to why... then I need to find a way back to Earth.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Of course, I'll enjoy the sights along the way, those aren't mutually exclusive.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Iana shakes the documents in her hands.
What's that...?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: City's Best Invention award... and you got a certificate?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Oh, those excitable Durins gave it to me.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: So you went to see an underground city and happened to win an inventor's award?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Oh my goodness, this prize photo— You all have to see this!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Beneath the azure dome, a peculiar-looking vehicle surges out from a subterranean waterfall.
Rainbows rise from the splash of the water curtain, Durin onlookers cheering with arms held high.
